content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: note_block
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "coarse_dirt", "quantity": 38, "index": 12}, {"type": "stripped_dark_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "orange_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 15, "index": 16}, {"type": "crimson_sign", "quantity": 6, "index": 17}, {"type": "acacia_stairs", "quantity": 19, "index": 18}, {"type": "saddle", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "detector_rail", "quantity": 53, "index": 30}, {"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 49, "index": 31}, {"type": "birch_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "warped_stairs", "quantity": 46, "index": 40}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]

thought: To craft note_block, I need to first craft acacia_planks and crimson_planks. I can craft acacia_planks using the acacia_log at slot 27. Therefore I will first move the acacia_log to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 4
